NYU-HHC Clinical and Translational Science Institute | Clinical and Translational Science Institute                                    Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Clinical and Translational Science Institute                                                                                  Home   What is the CTSI?   Research Services   Training & Education   Community Engagement                                  Home            Print  Email               - A + A                                                                                                                                                                         NYU-HHC Clinical and Translational Science Institute                                          Translating Research into Better Health   The New York University (NYU) – Health and Hospitals Corporation (HHC) Clinical and Translational Science Institute (CTSI) was established in 2009 through a Clinical and Translational Science Award (CTSA) from the National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences (NCATS). The NYU-HHC CTSI supports clinical and translational research that transforms health care and improves community health. We achieve this mission through an innovative public-private partnership of institutions with unique and complementary strengths: a private research university with a history of public service and substantial biomedical, behavioral, and population health expertise (NYU), the largest municipal healthcare system in the United States (HHC), a state psychiatric institute (Nathan Kline Institute), and numerous community organizations that represent the rich diversity of NYC. As a central hub, the CTSI catalyzes collaborative research and facilitates access to essential services, resources, and expertise necessary to engage in the full spectrum of clinical and translational research across our partners and the nationwide CTSA network.                                                              Research Services                     Research Guidance   Funding Support & Opportunities   Research Resources   Support for Collaboration   HHC Researcher Resources        More               Training & Education                     Degree Programs   Certificate Programs   Career Development Programs   Mentoring Programs        More               CTSI News & Events                     Newsletters   Calendar        More                                                                                  Quick Links       CTSI Newsletter   Cite the CTSI   Contact Us                Announcements       Funding Opportunity Announcement: Collaborative Innovation Awards   Deadline Extended! The NYU-HHC CTSI supports clinical and translational research that transforms health care and improves community health. We achieve this mission through an innovative public-private partnership of institutions with unique and complementary strengths: a private research university with a history of public service and substantial biomedical, behavioral, and population health expertise (NYU), the largest municipal healthcare system in the United States (HHC), a state psychiatric institute (Nathan Kline Institute), and numerous community organizations that represent the rich diversity of NYC. As a central hub, the CTSI catalyzes collaborative research and facilitates access to essential services, resources, and expertise necessary to engage in the full spectrum of clinical and translational research across our partners and the nationwide CTSA network.                                                              Research Services                     Research Guidance   Funding Support & Opportunities   Research Resources   Support for Collaboration   HHC Researcher Resources        More               Training & Education                     Degree Programs   Certificate Programs   Career Development Programs   Mentoring Programs        More               CTSI News & Events                     Newsletters   Calendar        More                                                                                  Quick Links       CTSI Newsletter   Cite the CTSI   Contact Us                Announcements       Funding Opportunity Announcement: Collaborative Innovation Awards   Deadline Extended!
